intro.header: The easiest & {lb} most affordable way of {lb} getting things {emphasis}
intro.paragraph: Jugglers are here to help you! Simply tell us what you need to get done along with your budget on we're on it. Yes, it's that easy!
nochance.title: Forget about your To-Do list
nochance.paragraph: Any job, task or service around Your Budget and Your Schedule.
category.title: Just post a task and we'll take care of the rest
category.paragraph: Posting a task on Juggle is easy and free of charge. Just explain what needs to get done along with your budget on we're on it. Juggle can help you with it all:
jugglers.title: Receive offers & choose the best Juggler for the job!
jugglers.paragraph: Select the best Juggler for your task by viewing reviews, badges and directly messaging!
footer.title: Sign up now for early {emphasis}
footer.paragraph: Now just sit back, relax and leave the rest to us!
